creator: mwittmann@atsworldwide.com
text:
Tested this in a two-column region-body.  As a sanity check, I tried <fo:block 
break-before="page">, which worked.  Workaround:  enclose the entire 
<fo:table> in an <fo:block break-before="column"> ... that works.
Bug fixed in latest Trunk (rev 584703), and probably in FOP 0.94
creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
